title: Infinity Edge or Blood Thirster as FIRST MAIN ITEM on adc?
body:
I use to go Doran > IE. 

I am now trying to go long sword + 3 bots > BF sword > vamp scepter (upgrade from my long sword).

I feel like since the chance of all ins at lvl2-3 is kinda low, the 3 bots (instead of 1 with doran) gives me more sustain in terms of the early few mins of the laning phase.
